author: MSNBC.com
title: Musician Anderson.Paak on trolling Trump with a 'trash monster'
description: Musician and record producer, Anderson .Paak joins Ari Melber to discuss why he’s fighting for criminal justice reform and how the justice system has affected his family personally. .Paak also describes how going through homelessness affected his life, saying…
fulltext:
Musician Anderson .Paak on trolling Trump with a 'trash monster' copied!

Musician and record producer, Anderson .Paak joins Ari Melber to discuss why he’s fighting for criminal justice reform and how the justice system has affected his family personally. .Paak also describes how going through homelessness affected his life, saying it gave him “character” and has helped him appreciate his success even more. .Paak also speaks about his video for: “The Season / Carry Me / The Waters” that depicts Trump, noting Trump is “one of the best trollers so why can’t we troll him back?”.

Read More

author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump WH rattled by rare rebuke from Chief Justice Roberts
description: Supreme Court Chief Justice John Roberts, a life-long federalist society conservative rebuts President Trump in an unusual move, after Trump claimed that certain judges were “Obama Judges”. Ari Melber breaks down how Supreme Court Justices speak carefully and…
fulltext:
Trump WH rattled by rare rebuke from Chief Justice Roberts copied!

Supreme Court Chief Justice John Roberts, a life-long federalist society conservative rebuts President Trump in an unusual move, after Trump claimed that certain judges were “Obama Judges”. Ari Melber breaks down how Supreme Court Justices speak carefully and don’t pick political fights, but Justice Roberts drew a line to defend the independence of the courts against those who would corrode the system and turn it into something more authoritarian.

Read More

author: MSNBC.com
title: Why Trump's own lawyer is Mueller's most important witness
description: Trump’s former White House Counsel Don McGahn reportedly stopped Trump from prosecuting Hillary Clinton and Jim Comey. Ari Melber breaks down how everything Don McGahn knows, Special Counsel Bob Mueller knows as well; McGahn is reportedly cooperating “extensi…
fulltext:
Why Trump's own lawyer is Mueller's most important witness copied!

Trump’s former White House Counsel Don McGahn reportedly stopped Trump from prosecuting Hillary Clinton and Jim Comey. Ari Melber breaks down how everything Don McGahn knows, Special Counsel Bob Mueller knows as well; McGahn is reportedly cooperating “extensively” with Mueller, sitting for at least 30 hours of interviews. Former House Judiciary Counsel Michael Conway, who wrote part of the Nixon impeachment recommendation tells Ari Melber that as a former White House counsel, McGahn will be Mueller’s “most important witness”.
